languages.text: "Вот как. Сбой в имплантах или настоящая верность? Я буду верить, что ты сам выбрал быть со мной. До конца".
"Well, well. Is it faulty implants, or true loyalty? I am going to believe that you have chosen to stay with me. To the end."
languages.original_text: "Вот как. Сбой в имплантах или настоящая верность? Я буду верить, что ты сам выбрал быть со мной. До конца".

traits.locale_text: "Well, well. Is it faulty implants, or true loyalty? I am going to believe that you have chosen to stay with me. To the end."
"Well, well. Is it faulty implants, or true loyalty? I am going to believe that you have chosen to stay with me. To the end."
"Well, well. Is it faulty implants, or true loyalty? I am going to believe that you have chosen to stay with me. To the end."

"Well, well. Is it faulty implants, or true loyalty? I am going to believe that you have chosen to stay with me. To the end."
"Well, well. Is it faulty implants, or true loyalty? I am going to believe that you have chosen to stay with me. To the end."

languages.text: 「なるほど。インプラントの欠陥か、それとも真の忠誠心のせいか？信じることにしよう─お前が自らの意志で、俺と共にいることを選んだのだと。最期まで」
languages.original_text: "Well, well. Is it faulty implants, or true loyalty? I am going to believe that you have chosen to stay with me. To the end."

traits.locale_text: 「なるほど。インプラントの欠陥か、それとも真の忠誠心のせいか？信じることにしよう─お前が自らの意志で、俺と共にいることを選んだのだと。最期まで」

languages.text: "Sieh an, sieh an ... Sind das fehlerhafte Implantate oder ist es wahre Treue? Ich werde glauben, dass du beschlossen hast, bei mir zu bleiben. Bis zum Ende."
languages.original_text: "Well, well. Is it faulty implants, or true loyalty? I am going to believe that you have chosen to stay with me. To the end."

traits.locale_text: "Sieh an, sieh an ... Sind das fehlerhafte Implantate oder ist es wahre Treue? Ich werde glauben, dass du beschlossen hast, bei mir zu bleiben. Bis zum Ende."

languages.text: « Eh bien... Doit-on mettre cela sur le compte d'implants défaillant ou est-ce de la loyauté ? Je choisis de croire que tu as décidé de rester à mes côtés. Jusqu'au bout. »
languages.original_text: "Well, well. Is it faulty implants, or true loyalty? I am going to believe that you have chosen to stay with me. To the end."

traits.locale_text: « Eh bien... Doit-on mettre cela sur le compte d'implants défaillant ou est-ce de la loyauté ? Je choisis de croire que tu as décidé de rester à mes côtés. Jusqu'au bout. »

languages.text: «Vaya, vaya. ¿Serán implantes defectuosos, o auténtica lealtad? Me decanto por creer que has decidido quedarte conmigo. Hasta el final».
languages.original_text: "Well, well. Is it faulty implants, or true loyalty? I am going to believe that you have chosen to stay with me. To the end."

traits.locale_text: «Vaya, vaya. ¿Serán implantes defectuosos, o auténtica lealtad? Me decanto por creer que has decidido quedarte conmigo. Hasta el final».

languages.text: “好吧，好吧。是你的植入物出了问题，还是你真的对我忠心耿耿？既然如此，那就留在我身边吧，直到最后一刻。”
languages.original_text: "Well, well. Is it faulty implants, or true loyalty? I am going to believe that you have chosen to stay with me. To the end."

traits.locale_text: “好吧，好吧。是你的植入物出了问题，还是你真的对我忠心耿耿？既然如此，那就留在我身边吧，直到最后一刻。”

languages.text: "Bak sen şu işe. Hatalı implantlar mı yoksa gerçek sadakat yüzünden mi böyle oldu acaba? Benimle kalmayı tercih ettiğine inanmak istiyorum. Son anıma dek."
languages.original_text: "Well, well. Is it faulty implants, or true loyalty? I am going to believe that you have chosen to stay with me. To the end."

traits.locale_text: "Bak sen şu işe. Buna hatalı implantlar mı yoksa gerçek sadakat mi denir? Benimle kalmayı tercih ettiğine inanmak istiyorum. Sonuna dek."
